raw_answer: 解:连接DF,∵AB=AC,∠A=36°,∴∠ABC=∠ACB=72°,∵BF平分∠ABC,∴∠ABF=FBC=36°,∴∠BFC=∠BCF=72°,∵AE=EF,DE⊥AF,∴AD=DF,∴∠DFE=36°,∴∠DFP=72°,∴∠DFB=∠CFB,在△DBF与△CBF中,≥ft\lbrace\begin{array}{l}{∠DFB=∠CFB}\\{BF=BF}\\{∠DBF=∠CBF}\end{array}\right.,∴△BDF≌△CBF(ASA),∴BD=BC,∵BF平分∠ABC,∴BP⊥CD,∴∠BPD=90°故选:D．
